introText: Hey, I'm Pascal Huber, a frontend developer from Lachen, Switzerland. Welcome to my portfolio page, where I provide an insight into my journey through the world of web development. My passion lies in creating appealing user interfaces and user-friendly websites. In my work as a frontend developer, I strive for clean code and functional designs.
trainingDescription: During my training as a frontend developer, I acquired comprehensive knowledge and worked on various projects that have deepened my skills in web development. In the portfolio section, you will find some of these projects that reflect my practical experience and my skills as a junior frontend developer.
juniorDeveloperContribution: With the expertise gained at this professional and project-based programming school, I am highly motivated to contribute my skills and experiences as your new junior developer and thus contribute to the success of your company.
frontendDevelopmentSkills: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.
sampleOfWork: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
projectDescriptionJoin: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projectDescriptionElPolloLoco: A simple jump-and-run game using an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe gather salsa bottles to defend against the aggressive chicken.
projectDescriptionSimpleCRM: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.
projectDescriptionPokedex: Based on the PokeAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogs Pok√©mon information.
contactFormText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
